attributes.action: prosecute BT over illegal ad -serving technology trials
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
According to a leaked report BT have been trialing the Phorm system,which matches adverts to user's web habits.This is totally illegal.Back in 2006 BT illegally intercepted their customers' web traffic, and illegally processed their personal data".BT are determined to continue with a further trial this summer.
This sets a dangerous precedent for internet customers and should be stopped.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
